title: Polki Diamond & Emerald Jadau Haaram - A Timeless Legacy
materials: Zambian Emerald. Crafted with traditional Jadau setting techniques unique to Hyderabadi craftsmanship. Gold features a radiant
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a double-stranded design adorned with meticulously set Polki diamonds in a Jadau style. The necklace features square diamond pendants suspended elegantly, leading to a central floral pendant showcasing a vibrant Zambian Emerald. The uncut diamonds are bezel-set, enhancing their natural brilliance. This piece embodies the grandeur of traditional South Indian jewelry design.
colors: Primarily gold with a vibrant green center from the Emerald
contrasted by the bright white shimmer of the Polki diamonds.
occasions: or any grand celebratory occasion where a touch of heritage and elegance is desired. Perfect for brides seeking a traditional yet opulent look or to elevate any modern event.
description: This Jadau Polki Haaram represents a legacy of South Indian craftsmanship. Each Polki diamond is unique, telling its own story. The Zambian Emerald adds a pop of color and symbolizes prosperity and good fortune. The Jadau setting ensures that the diamonds are secure and the piece is comfortable to wear. A true heirloom piece to be passed down through generations.
